about.title: About
about.heading: Thanks for stopping by. Who am I?
about.intro1: I'm Dani, a CTI Engineer and University of Bucharest graduate with nearly 5 years of experience as a mobile developer. I'm passionate about leveraging technology to drive meaningful improvements and add value to the work I do.
about.intro2: I'm committed to purposeful work, avoiding actions performed solely for their own sake. I'm proactive in asking questions to effectively plan and execute tasks with precision, and I embrace challenges with determination as a persistent problem-solver, always reaping knowledge rewards from every experience.
about.intro3: I'm dedicated to continuous learning and skill enhancement to deliver innovative solutions and maximize impact through hard work.
about.intro4: On the home page, you've probably noticed the three chips that describe me: Christian, Developer, and Reader. My faith as a Christian influences everything I do, including my work, as I strive to do everything by God's grace for Him!
about.passion: Being a developer is not just my vocation but also my passion. I enjoy solving interesting problems and creating useful things. But at the core of it all is my identity as a Christian.
about.reading: The third chip, "Reader," represents one of my most visible hobbies. Surprisingly, I didn't like reading until I entered university, but I've come to appreciate it as a helpful habit. I make an effort to read as much as possible on various topics, with a particular focus on Theology books.
about.why_work: Why choosing to work with me?
about.work_description: I want to work responsibly. I am young and have time to spare - that's a thing that I've discovered lately is that with only one client. But I could also take more to work on. That is why I've created a company. It allows me to easily work for more than one client if needed. With it I also am being able to track every paper work required by a trusted accountant. That way, I can focus more on the work itself and not so much of the other administration things.
about.contact_intro: If you want me to solve a problem for you, feel free to reach out! I'll respond shortly.
